content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. So, what price are you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro per month is much lower than what I'm looking for. I'm sure we can find a price that's fair for both of us. How about 650 Euro per month? That's a reasonable offer considering the location and amenities. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. Let's meet halfway. How about 575 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, 575 Euro per month is still not what I'm looking for. I'm willing to go down to 625 Euro per month, but that's my final offer. It's a very good price for such a prime location. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your price is high because of the location. Let's make a deal at 600 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro per month is still not enough for me. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this apartment. If you're not willing to pay the full price, I'm afraid we can't come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not willing to pay the full price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but without further discussion, I cannot accept a price that is not fair for both parties. If you are not willing to pay the full price, then I'm afraid we cannot continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [625] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be yours at 625 Euro per month. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
